Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a player of the game and contains all their information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String username, boolean isFirstGame, boolean isFirstPlayer, boolean hasEndGameCard)
      Creates a player.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      isFirstGame - true if the player is playing for the first time
      isFirstPlayer - true if the player is the first player
      hasEndGameCard - true if the player has the end game card

    • Player

      public Player(String username, boolean isFirstGame, boolean isFirstPlayer, boolean hasEndGameCard, List<Boolean> commonGoalCompleted)
      Creates a player.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      isFirstGame - true if the player is playing the first game
      isFirstPlayer - true if the player is the first player
      hasEndGameCard - true if the player has the end game card
      commonGoalCompleted - a list of booleans that indicates if the player has completed the common goals

    • isFirstGame

      public boolean isFirstGame()
      Tells whether it is the player's first game or not. If it is, the game will be played with only one common goal instead of two.
      Returns:
      true if it is the player's first game, false otherwise

    • isFirstPlayer

      public boolean isFirstPlayer()
      Tells whether the player is the first to play or not. If it is, the player will hold the 1st player seat.
      Returns:
      true if the player is the first to play, false otherwise

    • setHasEndGameCard

      public void setHasEndGameCard(boolean hasEndGameCard)
      Sets whether the player has the end game card or not.
      Parameters:
      hasEndGameCard - true if the player has the end game card, false otherwise

    • move

      public void move(List<Item> items, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Moves a straight line of tiles from the board to the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      items - the list of the tiles to move
      column - the index of the column of the bookshelf where the tiles will be placed (starting from 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the line is not straight or if the selection is empty

    • rearrangePickedItems

      public List<Item> rearrangePickedItems(List<Item> items, List<Integer> order) throws IllegalArgumentException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Rearranges the picked items in the given order. The order is an array of integers, where the i-th element is the new position of the i-th item (starting from 0). For example, if the order is (2, 0, 1), the first item will be placed in the third position, the second item will be placed in the first position and the third item will be placed in the second position.
      Parameters:
      items - the items to rearrange
      order - the desired order
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of items and the number of positions are not the same or if an item is placed in two different positions
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the new position is out of bounds

    • calculateScore

      public int calculateScore()
      Calculates the score of the player. It is made up of:
      • the points given by adjacent items in the bookshelf
      • the points given by personal and common goals
      • the points given by the end game card (if the player has it)
      Returns:
      the score of the player

    • getPersonalGoalPoints

      public int getPersonalGoalPoints()
      Returns the points given by the PersonalGoal.
      Returns:
      the points given by personal goals

    • getCommonGoalPoints

      public int getCommonGoalPoints()
      Returns the points given by the CommonGoals.
      Returns:
      the points given by common goals
